definition: to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)

sentences.english: You read hundreds of emails and thousands of tweets every day. But how many handwritten letters do you receive?
sentences.chinese: 想想看，你一天可以閱讀數百封郵件，數千篇微博。

sentences.english: To think, I could have lived all my life and missed it.
sentences.chinese: 想想看，我可能會活了一輩子而對此一無所知。

sentences.english: Think of the word you see on the page as only the tip of an iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 想想看，您在頁面上看到的一個單詞只是冰山一角。

sentences.english: If you think you can predict what you will like, think again.
sentences.chinese: 如果你認爲你擁有預知未來的能力，那麼，再想想看。

sentences.english: Come to think of it, what would his greatest memory be?
sentences.chinese: 想想看，這其中最非同尋常的一段會是什麼？

sentences.english: Imagine an 8-year-old kid looking at taxonomy books.
sentences.chinese: 想想看，我從八歲時就閱讀分類學著作。

sentences.english: If that sounds like something out of a far-fetched Star Trek episode, think again.
sentences.chinese: 如果你覺得這聽起來像是無稽之談，再想想看。

sentences.english: Think about it, it's pulling from the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 你們想想看，向下拉拽天花板的張力。

sentences.english: What if your entire car was covered in these powerhouses?
sentences.chinese: 想想看，如果你的整部車都覆蓋上這種發電站會怎樣？

sentences.english: You feel you as a baby when there are a summons…
sentences.chinese: 你想想看，我當時竟然像小孩子一樣大叫大跳起來。

sentences.english: Think about it. If you're reading this it's probably happened to you.
sentences.chinese: 想想看，當你讀到這篇文章，恰好感同身受時。

sentences.english: Look, what will happen if the US gets "tough" with China.
sentences.chinese: 想想看，如果美國對中國“強硬”起來會發生什麼。

sentences.english: Think about it, have you met anyone recently who really got your juices flowing?
sentences.chinese: 想想看，最近有有什麼人讓你意亂神迷的嗎？

sentences.english: Would you like to paint your girl without any clothes when she is a grown up?
sentences.chinese: 想想看，你願意在你女兒成年的時候給她畫裸體畫嗎？

definition: let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
at the minimum/at the very least
I would like to ask (usually used rhetorically)/one might well ask
right or wrong?/Is it right?/OK, yes? (colloquial)
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
